amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the NSA to target a U.S. person or acquire and store the content of a U.S. person's communications, including phone calls and e-mails.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 409 - 12 (Roll no. 411).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A069) Agreed to by recorded vote: 409 - 12 (Roll no. 411).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
